alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 10:45PM EST until February 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet late Saturday night. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Saturday.
